aircraft.value: Cyclops Vision - AC-6725-774 at Maintenance Hub-X

defect_observed.value: Fuel control unit drift. Abnormality observed during system test.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 25/08/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 26/08/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 27/08/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 31/08/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 03/09/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Fuel control unit drift. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
